short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Combines multiple code files into a single text file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly combine and manage multiple code files into a single, organized text file with the Sam Software Code Combiner extension. Perfect for developers, programmers, and AI enthusiasts, this tool simplifies the process of preparing and submitting code to AI systems by consolidating various code files into one file.

Features:

Add Files and Folders: Seamlessly select multiple files or entire folders from different locations on your computer.
Filter by Language: Automatically filter and include only code files based on popular programming languages, ensuring that only relevant files are combined.
Dynamic Management: Add or remove files and folders as needed, and view a real-time list of selected items.
Combine and Download: Merge selected files into one cohesive text file, making it easier to submit code to AI systems or other platforms.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface designed to streamline your workflow and simplify the process of preparing code for AI analysis or submission.
